question: 叩き
sourceAnswer:
<read>たたき</read>:: finely-chopped-fish-or-meat-(sometimes-seared-first)/mince | hitting-(e.g.-a-drum)/striking/beating/person-who-strikes-something | bashing/criticizing/attacking | robbery/extortion | whipping-(Edo-period-punishment)/lashing/flogging
<read>はたき</read>:: (feather)-duster | dusting
